question.ask: 1. Where have you been? I haven’t seen you in class all week.

std.value: Oh, I caught a cold, so I had to stay in.

question.ask: 4. Can you tell me how to get to the nearest bank?

std.value: Turn right at the first crossing. You cannot miss it.
std.ai: Turn right at the first crossing. You cannot miss it.

std.value: It’s a little far from here. You need to take a taxi or a bus.
std.ai: It’s a little far from here. You need to take a taxi or a bus.

std.value: Sure. Turn left at the second crossing, and you can see it.
std.ai: Sure. Turn left at the second crossing, and you can see it.

std.value: Certainly. Go along the street and turn right.
std.ai: Certainly. Go along the street and turn right.

std.value: Of course. Go down the street and turn left. You can see the tallest building. That’s it.
std.ai: Of course. Go down the street and turn left. You can see the tallest building. That’s it.
